snippet.title: [Dev Diary] Interview with Akard's voice actor David Menkin
snippet.description:
This time, we bring a new game character into the spotlight: Akard. Voiced be the outstanding David Menkin, enjoy an interesting interview and get new and unique insights about the character and his voice actor.

ABOUT THE GAME
Songs of Silence is a story-rich, turn-based 4X strategy game, with fast-paced intense real-time battles, wrapped in stunning Art Nouveau style, set in two distinct fantasy worlds threatened by the all-devouring Silence. 
🔜 Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/chimeraent/songs-of-silence
✅ Wishlist on Steam: https://bit.ly/SongsOfSilence
💛 Wishlist on GOG.com: https://www.gog.com/game/songs_of_silence
⭐ Add to your Wishlist on Humble Store: https://www.humblebundle.com/store/songs-of-silence
🔥 Join the Closed Beta https://forms.gle/exeqdLnAcHFL3W958
👉 Join our Discord https://discord.gg/W8UVyjMr92

FOLLOW SONGS OF SILENCE:
reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/songsofsilence/
X (formerly Twitter): https://twitter.com/songsofsilence_/
Soundcloud: https://www.reddit.com/r/songsofsilence/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/songsofsilence_game/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/songsofsilencegame/

#songsofsilence #strategygame #indiegame #turnbasedstrategy #4xstrategy #devdiary #voiceacting #voiceactor #omuk #davidmenkin #singleplayer #multiplayer
